title: How four years of war in Ukraine redefined the European Union
subhed: With Russia's aggression against Ukraine, the world that saw the construction of EU has all but disappeared. The 27 member states belatedly recognized that peace was 'no longer a given in Europe,' and awoke to their military weakness and energy dependence.

title: Switzerland in shock after tragic bar fire: 'It was a war zone. Burned hair, faces and hands'
subhed: The upscale French-speaking Alpine resort of Crans-Montana is in mourning after a fire in a bar claimed the lives of around 40 people and left 115 others seriously injured. Heart-wrenching testimonies and unanswered questions are pouring in.
